projects.name: Jalebi
projects.overview: An online platform for buying and selling various products.
projects.description: This project includes features such as user authentication, product listing, shopping cart, checkout, and order management.

projects.name: Task Management App
projects.overview: A web application for managing tasks and projects.
projects.description: Users can create tasks, assign them to team members, set deadlines, track progress, and generate reports.

projects.name: Social Media Dashboard
projects.overview: A dashboard for managing social media accounts and analyzing performance.
projects.description: Users can schedule posts, monitor engagement metrics, and generate insights using data visualization tools.
